name: ChronicGraftVersusHostDisease
title: Chronic Graft versus Host Disease
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Chronic graft versus host disease (GvHD) disorder codes),(Data Element Scope: Chronic (GvHD) disorder codes),(Inclusion Criteria: Chronic (GvHD) SNOMED CT "disorder" codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Any other type of GvHD (e.g., acute, lichenoid chronic GvHD, sclerodermoid chronic GvHD) or GvHD following a solid organ transplant)

concept.display: Chronic graft versus host disease after transplantation of bone marrow (disorder)

contains.display: Chronic graft versus host disease after transplantation of bone marrow (disorder)
